articles.title: Lao President Visits Lodging quarters of Kim Yong Nam
articles.content:
Lao President Visits Lodging quarters of Kim Yong Nam
 Vientiane, August 10 (KCNA Correspondent) -- Lao President Choummaly Sayasone Friday visited the lodging quarters  of Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.
					 He was accompanied by Vice Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Thongloun Sisoulth, Minister and Secretary General of the Presidency Phongsavath Boupha, Minister of Industry and Commerce Nam Vignaket, the minister of Power and Mining Industry, Lao Ambassador to the DPRK Kiettisak Keobanhdith, and officials concerned.
					
					 They were greeted by Kim Yong Nam, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Kang Min Chol, minister of Mining Industry, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Han Pong Ho, DPRK ambassador to Laos, and other suite members.
					
					 A conversation was held in a warm and friendly atmosphere.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Back Home
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Back Home 
 Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, flew back home Saturday after wrapping up his official goodwill visits to Vietnam and Laos.
					 Also returning home were Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Kang Min Chol, minister of Mining Industry, and Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and other suite members.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Calls for Finally Completing Operations to Recover from Flood Damage
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Calls for Finally Completing Operations to Recover from Flood Damage 
 Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and director of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army, inspected the Joyang Coal Mine hit hardest by the recent flood. 
					 In hearty response to the order of Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Marshal Kim Jong Un, servicepersons succeeded in completely rehabilitating the Kaechon-Joyang railway area in a short span of time less than three days in the spirit of "At one go", ensuring the operation of the first freight train carrying coal. 
					
					 They are now hastening the reconstruction of the railway station building, the improvement of waterways, the building of retaining walls and rehabilitation of pits, in the same spirit displayed in the operations to recover from flood damage. 
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae went round the railway station compound and waterways improvement sites to encourage the servicepersons and people in their drive fully demonstrating the might of great army-people unity. 
					
					 He stressed the need to bring people's living in the area of the coal mine to normal under the slogan "Let us help people!" and finally round off the rehabilitation.
					
					 He also learned about the progress made in rehabilitating the main bridge and took measures.

articles.title: Condemnation of U.S. and S. Korean Regime's Attempted Hideous Terrorism against DPRK Called for
articles.content:
Condemnation of U.S. and S. Korean Regime's Attempted Hideous Terrorism against DPRK Called for
 Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- Relevant bodies and organizations including the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK sent to international bodies, organizations and individual personages including the UN copies of the press release issued at the press conference held with Jon Yong Chol who was arrested after infiltrating into the DPRK to carry out such  politically-motivated hideous terrorism as hurting the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership sponsored by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime in violation of international law.
					 The press release was sent on August 7 to the Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights, the Anti-Terror Committee of Security Council of the United Nations and other UN organizations and relevant personages of the UN Office including the UN secretary general and the president of the UN General Assembly.
					
					 The National Peace Committee of Korea, the Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People and other organizations sent it on August 2 to 93 international bodies, organizations and individuals of 34 countries including the World Peace Council, the International Anti-Imperialism Coordinating Committee, the International League of People's Struggle and the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization.
					
					 The press release brought to light the organized and premeditated crimes committed by the U.S. and the puppet regime and requested the international organizations to take appropriate measures for checking them.
					
					 Earlier, the DPRK Association for Human Rights Studies and the Central Committee of the DPRK Red Cross Society sent a press release to more than 10 UN organizations and NGOs for human rights and 97 NGOs and individuals in more than 20 countries. It was issued at the press conference held with Pak Jong Suk who returned to the DPRK after she was taken to south Korea due to the puppet regime's allurement and abduction operations.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations and Delegates Leave
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations and Delegates Leave 
 Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- Delegations and delegates of Germany, Singapore, Italy, China, the Czech Republic and Taipei of China left Pyongyang by air on Friday and Saturday after taking part in the 2012 Pyongyang Machine Equipment Exhibition.

articles.title: Recovery from Flood Damage Makes Headway in South Phyongan Province
articles.content:
Recovery from Flood Damage Makes Headway in South Phyongan Province
 Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- The work to recover from the flood damage is making brisk headway in South Phyongan Province.
					 Servicepersons successfully carried out the operation to repair the railroad bed from Kaechon to Joyang and Sunchon, ensuring the safety in the train operation.
					
					 Service personnel joined residents in Sinyang County in carrying a large amount of earth and doing a huge stone work to restore a 500-meter-long road in a short span of time. In the meantime, those in Sampho-dong of Kaechon City succeeded in completing the project for the rehabilitation of the dyke along the Namchon River.
					
					 Servicepersons and people repaired the dyke in the 270 meter-long section, cleared mud piled up on waterways in Maengsan County and carried out the project for building a floor slab at a kindergarten in the Pukchang County seat.
					
					 Lots of banks and buildings, roads totaling 230km and railways in the section of 19km, etc., have been restored in the province, bringing the people's living to normal and putting the operation of vehicles and trains on a normal footing.
					
					 Anju City repaired at least 5,000 dwelling houses left inundated or partially destroyed.
					
					 Songchon and Sinyang Counties are dynamically pushing forward the repair of hundreds of houses.
					
					 A vigorous drive is now under way in the province to reconstruct educational and public health buildings or build new ones. 
					
					 More than 14,000 hectares of farmland hit by the flood are being recovered.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spreads to Educators
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spreads to Educators 
 Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un sent birthday spreads to Prof. and Dr. Ri Kun Yong, who is People's Scientist and a teacher at Kim Chaek University of Technology, and People's Artiste Ro Yong Gwon, who is a teacher at Art School of the Korean People's Army (KPA), congratulating them on their 70th birthdays. 
					 Ri Kun Yong has worked heart and soul for scientific research and education for posterity at Kim Chaek University of Technology for decades. 
					
					 He newly developed several subjects, wrote textbooks, reference books and scientific papers and raised six doctors and many others who took academic degrees or titles. 
					
					 Ro Yong Gwon successfully sang the popular songs "Thanks to Benefits of Leader" and "Full of Laugh" working as a singer at the KPA Song and Dance Ensemble and the Mansudae Art Troupe. 
					
					 At an educational organ of the KPA he wrote valuable papers making contributions to the development of arts education. He is now contributing a large share to training future artists. 
					
					 General secretary Kim Jong Il let them receive high official commendations, highly appreciating their feats, and showed deep loving care for them so that they might take part in several national conferences.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun U.S. Terrorism against DPRK Bound to Fail
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun U.S. Terrorism against DPRK Bound to Fail
 Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- U.S. terrorism against the DPRK is bound to fail, warns Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a bylined article.
					 Under the backstage wire-pulling of the U.S. the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors hurled traitors to the nation into gruesome terror operations to destroy the inviolable statues symbolic of the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its grand monuments only to be discovered, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. has perpetrated state-sponsored terrorism against the DPRK for years.
					
					 Finding it hard to frighten the Korean people by force of arms and through sanctions, the U.S. is seeking a way out in committing monstrous state-sponsored terrorism. The U.S. committed countless cases of terrorism against sovereign states. But such hideous and base state-sponsored, politically-motivated terrorism attempted this time is something unprecedented in its aims and methods. International conventions call for branding any international terrorism as a crime and meting out a severe punishment of it.
					
					 No statute of limitation is applicable to the perpetrators of such international terrorism.
					
					 The U.S. should be held responsible for manipulating behind the scene such terrorism against the DPRK, make an official apology for it and punish the prime movers. Ant it should give assurances that such terrorism would not repeat itself. Otherwise, the situation will be beyond control and the U.S. will be wholly accountable for this.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to take a responsible approach, properly understanding such will of the DPRK.

articles.title: Truth about US, S. Korean Abduction and Terrorism Disclosed(3)
articles.content:
Truth about US, S. Korean Abduction and Terrorism Disclosed  (3)
 Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime are abducting even people of the DPRK aboard wrecked ships and taking them away to south Korea.
					 International law calls for sending back to their countries those people in distress found in seas.
					
					 The south Korean regime put in custody two residents of the DPRK who had been adrift toward the south in the East Sea in October 2011. It has not yet sent them back to the north, pressurizing them to make "ideological conversion." When nine residents of the DPRK were adrift to Japan after meeting distress in the East Sea in September of the same year, it took all of them to south Korea in conspiracy with the Japanese reactionaries.
					
					 The south Korean regime abducted 31 residents of the DPRK who had been adrift in the West Sea in February 2011 and took them to south Korea. It resorted to appeasement, threat and even torture, pressurizing them to make "ideological conversion" for more than 50 days. It finally refused to let four of them come back to the north. These were thrice-cursed atrocities.
					
					 At least 70 inhabitants of the north were abducted to south Korea after meeting shipwreck in seas during the office of the Lee Myung Bak regime.
					
					 When those residents abducted by south Korean agents in a third country refuse to comply with their unacceptable demands, they were put in custody and persecuted in basements of their embassies or consulates general for several months or years before being taken to south Korea.
					
					 In case of women they are reduced to sexual slaves for them. When they feel unbearable shame and get degenerated, they are taken to south Korea.
					
					 After being taken to south Korea, they are questioned for several months by the "joint investigation team" made up of agents of the Intelligence Service, the Ministry of Unification and military and police officers. Then they are sent to such concentration camp called "Hanawon" for three-four month-long "brainwashing for anti-communism" before being sent to different parts of south Korea.
					
					 They are subject to all sorts of unbearable maltreatment and contempt.
					
					 More than 60 percent of them are wandering about in streets without any job. Even those employed are forced to do most tough and dirty and dangerous work for the pay less than the half of the wages of ordinary workers in south Korea. 95.6 percent of them live in a small rented room and 75 percent of them are below the poverty line. They have to carry with resident registration cards specially marked "Defector to south Korea" so that they are isolated and maltreated wherever they go. Their children are insulted at schools.
					
					 Some of them live like animals on the side of roads leading to mountains to eke out their living. They live on the leftover food thrown by mountaineers in daytime and sleep in the open air, their bodies covered with tree leaves. 
					
					 Those who find no means of living in south Korea after being taken there get degenerated. They either choose to commit crimes or suicides or flee to a third country.
					
					 It is the sordid method employed by the U.S. and the puppet regime to drive those hopeless abductees into crimes against the DPRK.

articles.title: KCNA Report on Kim Jong Il's Journeys for Patriotic Devotion(5)
articles.content:
KCNA Report on Kim Jong Il's Journeys for Patriotic Devotion(5)
 Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- General secretary Kim Jong Il led the onward movement for a great surge day and night with the staunch will not to slacken the speed of the forced march before achieving a final victory. His last three years was a period in which he reviewed the popular and heroic life as a peerless patriot.
					 He visited nearly 1 000 units in those three years. He made ceaseless forced marches of guerilla style from the east to the west, from the west to the north, saying he used to travel along rough roads to visit far-off construction sites before anyone else. 
					
					 In less than a hundred days from January of 2009 he covered tens of thousands of km to visit four times as many army units, factories and farms as those done by him in the same period in 2008. 
					
					 He visited South Hamgyong Province dozens of times, launching a general offensive for a great final victory. As a result, there appeared a fertilizer production system based on coal gasification in the wake of such auspicious event as technological updating of vinalon production. The Juche-oriented refractory industry began operating in full capacity. 
					
					 In the crucible of the industrial revolution in the new century, many heavy and light industrial centers, stock breeding, poultry and fish farms were put on a scientific, intensive and industrial basis. 
					
					 Cultural and entertainment centers and catering centers have sprung up in different parts of the country to fit for a highly civilized socialist country. All these structures serve as precious assets for the happiness of the people. 
					
					 In 2011 Kim Jong Il called on all people to put steady spurs to Songun Chollima, to the general offensive in order to demonstrate the indomitable mental power and revolutionary spirit of heroic Korea all over the world. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il lived a life as a great patriot, performing undying exploits for the era and the revolution, the country and its people with his outstanding ideas and theories, distinguished leadership ability and iron-will and superhuman energy. He was aboard a train for field guidance to mix with people till the last moments of his life. 
					
					 The world knows no such great man as Kim Jong Il who laid an eternal foundation for happiness of posterity, totally dedicating himself to the people. He suffered all sorts of pain and ordeals as a revolutionary, leader and man. 
					
					 His revolutionary career is, indeed, a sacred history of the sun to always shine along with the prosperity of Kim Il Sung's nation. The history of his forced marches made by him with his boundless devotion to the country, the revolution and people is a legendary patriotic history which could be made only by Kim Jong Il, peerless patriot and father of the people. 
					
					 The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un called his patriotic idea Kim Jong Il's patriotism and authored the historic work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country," reflecting the law to govern the building of a thriving nation and the unanimous desire of all the service personnel and people. This made the whole country pervade with Kim Jong Il's patriotism, 
					
					 The Korean people have witnessed the patriotic soul, breath and spirit of Kim Jong Il in the personality of another great man. 
					
					 Standing at the watershed of history for advance in the new century of Juche, Marshal Kim Jong Un is making tireless journeys with love for the people to make sure that the valuable seeds sown by Kim Jong Il on the land with his total dedication all his life yield bountiful fruits. 
					
					 He led servicepersons to work with sweat of their brow like patriots, personally planting trees with care on the Tree-Planting Day. When he visited apartment houses in Changjon Street and the construction sites of the Ryugyong Health Complex, People's Open-air Ice Rink, Rungna People's Park, etc, he told officials to do more work for the real benefits of the people by considering it as a top priority and an absolute task to provide conveniences to people. 
					
					 He praised the builders of Tanchon Port who did good things for the country and its people as genuine heroes and patriots of whom the country can be proud before the world. 
					
					 He saw to it that the 66th founding anniversary of the Korean Children's Union was grandly celebrated as the greatest event in history. This was his expression of his noble love for the future and posterity. The celebrations boundlessly excited all the people of the country.
					
					 He also made sure that the country grandly celebrated the War Victory Day, demonstrating the indomitable spirit and national dignity of heroic Korea. He thus helped glorify the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung for winning the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War for all ages and the younger generation carry forward the fighting spirit of the elder generation. 
					
					 Descendants of Kim Il Sung's nation, soldiers and disciples of Kim Jong Il, will dash ahead like the wind for a final victory in hearty response to Kim Jong ll's patriotism, the acme of socialist patriotism, and surely build a thriving nation in this land under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Koreans in Russia Hold Commemorative Meeting
articles.content:
Koreans in Russia Hold Commemorative Meeting 
 Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- The Autonomous Society for Korean National Culture in Partizansk City held a meeting Thursday on the 1st anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il's historic visit to Siberia and Far Eastern region of the Russian Federation and on the 67th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					  Members of the society and Koreans in Russia were on hand. 
					
					 Present there on invitation were staff members of the DPRK general consulate in Nakhodka.
					
					 A letter to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					 The chairman of the society said President Kim Il Sung defeated the Japanese imperialists through the hard-fought armed struggle to liberate Korea, a great exploit not only in Korea's history but in the world history.
					
					 He said with appreciation that Kim Jong Il visited Siberia and Far Eastern region last year to put the DPRK-Russia friendship on a new higher stage, thereby making a great contribution to the peace of Northeast Asia.
					
					 Under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Un, the Korean people have frustrated the vicious aggression moves of the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea against the DPRK and made achievements in building a thriving nation as desired by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chairman stressed the need to strive for Korea's reunification upholding the banner of "By our nation itself" despite the desperate efforts of the anti-reunification forces, and make efforts for the steady development of the DPRK-Russia friendship.

articles.title: Koreans in China Accuse U.S. and S. Korean Regime of Their Attempted Anti-DPRK Terrorism
articles.content:
Koreans in China Accuse U.S., S. Korean Regime of Their Attempted Anti-DPRK Terrorism 
 Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement on August 5 saying that the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime can never escape from responsibilities for their hideous terrorism against the DPRK.
					 The statement accused the U.S. and the south Korean regime of running the whole gamut of trickeries to deny the fact while talking about "north's abetment" and claiming "it was something impossible." 
					
					 However, their unreasonable remarks only bring to bolder relief their criminal nature, charged the statement.
					
					 A man, who could become a witness in disclosing the hideous terrorist plot, was found dead one morning in south Korea a few days ago. His strange death suggests a lot, said the statement, and went on:
					
					 When their anachronistic moves to stifle Songun Korea proved ineffective in the face of the single-minded unity of the leader, the party and the masses, the U.S. and the south Korean regime tried to commit state-sponsored, politically-motivated hideous terrorism unprecedented in history.
					
					 Denial can never write off facts and distortion can not erase history.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean regime, obsessed with sabotage activity, terrorism, subversion and fabrication, should wake up from their illusion and immediately stop their reckless moves.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK who turned out as one under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un will surely throw the U.S. and the puppet regime that hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK into the scrap heap of history.

articles.title: Korean Youth in China Denounce U.S. and S. Korea for Their Hideous Terrorism
articles.content:
Korean Youth in China Denounce U.S. and S. Korea for Their Hideous Terrorism
 Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- The Youth Federation of Koreans in China released a statement on August 1 in denunciation of the politically-motivated terrorism attempted by the U.S. and the south Korean Lee Myung Bak regime.
					 The statement said: The interviews with Pak Jong Suk (she came back to the DPRK after she was abducted to south Korea being allured by a south Korean agent) and Jon Yong Chol (a defector to south Korea who was arrested after he crossed back the border being assigned the mission of destroying a statue and monument, symbol of the dignity of the DPRK) revealed the truth about the hideous politically motivated terrorism, allurement and abduction of DPRK inhabitants by the U.S. and the south Korean regime.
					
					 The recent hideous terrorism is another incident of hurting the dignity of supreme leadership of the DPRK in pursuance of the U.S. ever-more undisguised hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 The Lee regime let loose strings of invectives hurting the dignity and social system of the DPRK and kicked up sordid propaganda, irritating the army and people of the DPRK, straining the tension to the extreme and pushing the inter-Korean relations to the lowest ebb.
					
					 In disregard of international law, peace and national reunification, the U.S. and the Lee regime have slandered the dignity of the supreme leadership, social system and people of the DPRK, being intent on stifling it. They are doomed to face the stern punishment of history and nation.
					
					 Under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, the officials of the Federation and all the Korean youth in China would strive to wipe out the Lee regime which plunged the inter-Korean ties to a deadlock and even dare hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, being obsessed with the sycophantic treachery and confrontation with compatriots.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Hold Madcap Military Exercises against DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Hold Madcap Military Exercises against DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers started madcap sea-borne infiltration exercises aimed at invading the north in the east, west and south coastal areas of Korea from August 6.
					 Units at all levels under the puppet army command for special warfare are involved in the two-week saber-rattling.
					
					 The warlike forces have become intent on drill of striking targets after infiltrating into the coastal area of the DPRK in secrecy through the sea.
					
					 They opened to public their exercises on Anmyon Islet in Thaean County of South Chungchong Province on August 8, stirring up war fever.

articles.title: Fact about Anti-DPRK Entity Disclosed by S. Korean Magazine
articles.content:
Fact about Anti-DPRK Entity Disclosed by S. Korean Magazine
 Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- South Korea's magazine Weekly Korea recently disclosed the true colors of the "Statue Demolition Society" (SDS), an anti-DPRK organization.
					 According to the magazine, the matter of forming the SDS was brought up for discussion at a "2010 year-end gathering" of defectors to south Korea from the north.
					
					 At the meeting, Kim Song Min, representative of the "Front for Liberation of North Korean People" and concurrently of the "Voice of Free North Korea", instigated those present to turn out in the formation of the "society", saying that "symbolic action for bringing change in the north's social system is to demolish the statues." After all, the SDS came into being as an organization consisting of defectors who betrayed their country, parents and families.
					
					 The gathering was also attended by the south Korean "government" authorities.
					
					 The "society", formed with back of the Lee Myung Bak regime, is tasked to blow up statues and monuments, holy places in the DPRK.
					
					 The United States and the Lee group of traitors supplied fund and all necessary means for the SDS's operation and subversive activities.
					
					 Under their directive, the society made desperate efforts to undermine the social system in the DPRK. 
					
					 It once forwarded a plan to demolish leader Kim Jong Il's old home in the Paektusan Secret Camp but gave it up halfway because of the DPRK's tightened security and obstacle in import of explosives. 
					
					 In recent months, too, the U.S. and the Lee group examined and approved the "society's" plan to demolish statues and monuments in the DPRK while rendering full support to it. 
					
					 This being a hard fact, they have denied the existence of the SDS even after Jon Yong Chol, a man involved in the recently-detected heinous terrorist case, testified to the fact about it. 
					
					 Worse still, they insisted that the "society" is a "bogus organization" and termed the recent terrorist case as the DPRK's "own drama."
					
					 It was under such developments that Weekly Korea exposed the fact about the existence of the SDS, thus laying bare the dirty colors of the Lee group of traitors. 
					
					 The magazine is one of the leading ultra-rightist conservative media in south Korea which would defend the Lee group's anti-reunification policy. This clearly shows that liars have short-wings and truth is bound to be distinguished with falsity. 
					
					 Any provokers to the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership will have to pay dearly for their deed.

articles.title: S. Korea Stricken by Heat
articles.content:
S. Korea Stricken by Heat
 Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- More than 1,015,000 livestock such as chicken and duck perished in south Korea for three weeks from July 20 due to the boiling heat that struck south Korea, according to south Korean Broadcasting System.
					 In the meantime, it was reported that sultry heat left rice plants withered away and lots of shellfishes dead in South and North Jolla Provinces.

articles.title: Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory Introduced by Xinhua, China
articles.content:
Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory Introduced by Xinhua, China
 Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- The Xinhua News Agency introduced Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory on August 2.
					 It said that most of the members of the Moranbong Band personally organized by the supreme leader Kim Jong Un of the DPRK this year are graduates from Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory. This prestigious conservatory is like a cradle for artistes of the DPRK.
					
					 Referring to the history of the conservatory, the news agency continued:
					
					 Not a few graduates from the conservatory proved successful at many international contests and received the title of Merited Artiste. They are playing the role as musical talents.
					
					 There is a systematic educational system for training talented artistes in the DPRK.
					
					 For example, there are art schools and children's palaces, extra-curricular educational centers, in every province and city of the country.
					
					 Various provinces select students with high artistic skills among those students who have finished the eleven-year compulsory education and give them an opportunity to take exams with a view to training talented artists. Those students who obtained excellent marks in the exams enter Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory.
					
					 Its students are given lectures and provided with board and lodging free of charge.
					
					 After their graduation, they become teachers or join such prestigious art organizations of the DPRK as the Moranbong Band, the Unhasu Orchestra, the Mansudae Art Troupe and the National Symphony Orchestra.
					
					 The news agency also said that songs in praise of the great men including the song "Footstep" are popular among the service personnel and people in the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats for National Unity
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats for National Unity
 Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- On August 12, Juche 89 (2000), leader Kim Jong Il had a talk with delegates of media organs in the north and the south of Korea in Pyongyang, at which he elaborated on the mission and duties they should take in implementing the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 He called on them to actively carry on media activities helpful to implementing the joint declaration and meeting the desire of the people, free from obsolete practices of fanning confrontation and distrust among the fellow countrymen.
					
					 He stated that he was willing to join hands with anybody who would support the joint declaration and opt for achieving national reunification, irrespective of their party affiliation and regardless of their past wrongdoings.
					
					 At that time, a south Korean delegate questioned him when the day of reunification would come. His question was prompted by his judgment that the issue of national reunification could be settled only by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il gave an impromptu answer to the question, saying the day of reunification will be dependent on the determination of the north and the south of Korea and it can be brought earlier when both the north and the south make concerted efforts for it. His remarks aroused admiration of the south Korean delegates.
					
					 Another south Korean delegate said that the DPRK reached a high level in making animated films and computer software and, therefore, it is likely that the DPRK would make great profits if it operates joint ventures with foreign countries.
					
					 Seeing the delegates, the leader said that both the north and the south can share interests common to the nation if they make joint venture in those fields.
					
					 The south Korean delegates were deeply moved by his noble idea that puts the nation's interests above anything else.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Chinese Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Chinese Website
 Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- Chinese internet website Zhonghua posted the main contents of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country" on August 4.
					 The work, made public on July 26, 2012, clarifies the essence of   Kim Jong Il's patriotism and leader Kim Jong Il's life characterized by love for the motherland and its people.
					
					 It also indicates the important issues arising in embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held in Peru
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held in Peru
 Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- A seminar was held in Lima, Peru on August 3 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of the start of the Songun revolutionary leadership by general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were personages of the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland), Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru, People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Kim Jong Suk Library, Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship and masses.
					
					 A report delivered by Guillermo Alcazar Ribera, chairman of the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, was followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and the speakers stressed the shining exploits performed by Kim Jong Il for the world socialist cause would be always remembered by humankind along with his great august name.
					
					 They noted that the original Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il is being creditably carried forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They condemned the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean regime for attempting to commit state-sponsored, politically-motivated hideous terrorism against DPRK and the Korean nation and fully supported the statement issued by a spokesman for the National Defence Commission of the DPRK on July 29.
					
					 They expressed conviction that the army and people of the DPRK would achieve great successes in the struggle for building a thriving socialist nation and achieving the country's reunification, single-mindedly united around Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae da tarea de  recuperar zona carbonifera de Joyang
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae da tarea de  recuperar zona carbonifera de Joyang
 Pyongyang, 11 de agosto (ACNC) -- Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, conocio en el terreno la Mina Carbonifera de Joyang que habia sido destruida gravemente por las recientes inundaciones.
					 Los militares del EPC, movilizados en la campana de recuperacion de danos en acato a la orden del Comandante Supremo Mariscal Kim Jong Un, aseguraron con el espiritu de un salto el transporte de cargas recuperando en menos de 3 dias  la zona de ferrovia Kaechon-Joyang y aceleran la reconstruccion de la estacion ferroviaria de la Mina de Joyang, el arreglo de canales y construccion de muro de contencion y la rehabilitacion de galerias.
					
					 En su recorrido por el recinto de la estacion ferroviaria y el lugar de arreglo de canal, Choe estimulo a los militares y civiles que muestran el poderio de la unidad entre el ejercito y el pueblo.
					
					 Destaco que bajo la consigna "!Ayudemos el pueblo!", deben completar la campana de recuperacion estabilizando la vida de los damnificados.
					
					 Por otra parte, Choe averiguo en el terreno como se reconstruye un puente importante averiado y tomo medida necesaria.

articles.title: Regresa Kim Yong Nam
articles.content:
Regresa Kim Yong Nam
 Pyongyang, 11 de agosto (ACNC) -- Regreso el dia 11 el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, tras concluir su visita oficial y de amistad a la Republica Socialista de Vietnam y la Republica Democratica Popular Lao.
					 Vinieron tambien el ministro de Comercio Exterior Ri Ryong Nam, el ministro de Industria Extractiva Kang Min Chol, el vicecanciller Kung Sok Ung y otros acompanantes.

articles.title: RPDC envia documento a organizaciones internacionales
articles.content:
RPDC envia documento a organizaciones internacionales
 Pyongyang, 11 de agosto (ACNC) -- En relacion con que Estados Unidos y la banda titere del Sur de Corea intentaban cometer el atentado politico de Estado encaminado a ofender la maxima dignidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea violando flagrantemente la ley internacional, la cancilleria y otros organos y entidades correspondientes de esta despacharon a la ONU y otras organizaciones y entidades internacionales y las personalidades  individuales el documento de entrevista con Jon Yong Chol que fue detenido al infiltrarse en la Corea democratica.
					 El documento fue transmitido el dia 7 a las organizaciones de la ONU inclusive la oficina del alto comisionado de la ONU para los derechos humanos y el comite  antiterrorista del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, al secretario general de la ONU, al presidente de la Asamblea General y otras personalidades de la Oficina de la ONU.
					
					 El Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz, el Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con los Pueblos del Mundo y otras entidades coreanas lo despacharon el dia 2 a las 93 organizaciones y entidades internacionales y personalidades procedentes de 34 paises, entre otros, el Consejo Mundial de la Paz, el Comite Internacional de Coordinacion Antiimperialista, la Liga Internacional de la Lucha del Pueblo, la Organizacion de Solidaridad de los Pueblos Afro-Asiaticos.
					
					 La nota revela los actos criminales organizados y planificados por EE.UU. y la banda titere y demanda a las organizaciones y entidades internacionales tomar las medidas necesarias para detenerlos.
					
					 Con anterioridad, la Asociacion Coreana de Estudio de DDHH y el Comite Central de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de Corea emitieron el documento de entrevista con Pak Jong Suk, quien fue llevada secuestrada al Sur de Corea por la banda titere surcoreana y regreso al regazo de la patria, a mas de 10 organizaciones de DDHH de la ONU y no gubernamentales y las 97 organizaciones y entidades no gubernamentales y personalidades de mas de 20 paises.

articles.title: Marcha bien la campana de recuperacion en Phyong-an del Sur
articles.content:
Marcha bien la campana de recuperacion en Phyong-an del Sur
 Pyongyang, 11 de agosto (ACNC) -- Se dinamiza la campana de recuperacion de danos ocasionados por las inundaciones en la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur.
					 Los soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea culminaron la reconstruccion de lineas ferroviarias Kaechon-Joyang y Kaechon-Sunchon y reanudaron asi la operacion segura de trenes.
					
					 En el distrito de Sinyang, rehabilitaron en un corto plazo con los habitantes locales una carretera de 500 metros y en el barrio Sampho de la ciudad de Kaechon, terminaron la obra del dique del rio Namchon.
					
					 Repararon un dique en 270 metros y eliminaron los lodos amontonados en el canal en el distrito de Maengsan e instalaron la losa de entrepiso en el jardin de la infancia de la cabeza distrital de Pukchang.
					
					 Vuelven a la normalidad la vida del pueblo y el transito de camiones y trenes gracias a la rehabilitacion de diques y edificios, mas de 230 kilometros y 19 kilometros de carretera y ferrocarril, respectivamente, en toda la provincia.
					
					 Se reconstruyeron en la ciudad de Anju mas de 5 mil viviendas anegadas o destruidas parcialmente.
					
					 Los distritos de Songchon y Sinyang impulsan a buen ritmo la reparacion de las viviendas para centenares de nucleos familiares.
					
					 Se realizan igualmente la recuperacion y la construccion de establecimientos de educacion y salud publica.
					
					 Ademas se recuperan mas de 14 mil hectareas de tierras cultivables afectadas por la crecida de aguas.

articles.title: Educadores reciben alimentos de cumpleanos
articles.content:
Educadores reciben alimentos de cumpleanos
 Pyongyang, 11 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio los alimentos de cumpleanos al Prof. titular y Dr. Ri Kun Yong, profesor y cientifico del Pueblo de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, y a Ro Yong Gwon, profesor y artista del Pueblo de la Escuela de Arte del Ejercito Popular de Corea, quienes acogen el septuagesimo cumpleanos.
					 Durante varios decenios, Ri vino dedicandose a la investigacion cientifica y la educacion de generaciones venideras en la citada universidad.
					
					 Exploro nuevas asignaturas, redacto los manuales, libros de referencia y monografias y formo a numerosos poseedores de grado academico o categoria docente, inclusive a 6 doctores.
					
					 Trabajando como vocalista en el Conjunto Artistico del EPC y el Conjunto Artistico Mansudae, Ro interpreto excelentemente las canciones "Gracias a la benevolencia del lider" y "Crecen las sonrisas", conocidas ampliamente entre los militares y civiles coreanos y otras.
					
					 En dicha institucion docente del EPC, contribuye al desarrollo de la educacion del arte y a la formacion de los artistas de reserva compilando valiosos trabajos.
					
					 En reconocimiento de tales meritos, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il les premio con altas condecoraciones estatales y eligio como delegados a varias conferencias.
